thread.section_title: Teenage couple die after their 4×4 is hit by a truck – Metro
thread.title: Teenage couple die after their 4×4 is hit by a truck
thread.title_full: Teenage couple die after their 4×4 is hit by a truck

author: robwaugh1974
title: Teenage couple die after their 4×4 is hit by a truck
text:
Gary Kelly, 19 and Delia Keary (Picture Facebook) A teenage couple have died within hours of each other after their car was hit by a truck near Limerick in Ireland.
Donald Trump 'handed Germany a £300bn invoice for unpaid Nato contributions' Delia Keary, 18, died in hospital, hours after the crash.
Her boyfriend Gary Kelly, 19, was instantly killed when their 4×4 collided with a truck on the N21 Limerick Tralee Road in Ireland.
Delia was taken to the University Hospital Limerick, but died of her injuries.
The driver of the truck was not injured.
Friends have paid tribute to the ‘teenage sweethearts’ online.
One friend wrote, ‘You will live on in all those who loved you. Until we see each other next we will mourn your passing each day.’
Another wrote, ‘I’m so grateful to have had you in my life for as long as you were here, and I hope you rest in peace. With all my love x.’
More Muslim women gather on Westminster Bridge to condemn 'abhorrent' attack 
Parent slammed for sending child to school with cold McDonald's Happy Meal as packed lunch 
Girl, 10, 'not allowed on plane because she was wearing leggings'
